title: firo-c42001-09-confirmation_of_arrival
text: EXCHANGE PROGRAM – CONFIRMATION OF STUDY ACADEMIC YEAR 20..../20.... (To be signed at the end of study at the host university) We confirm that Mr/Ms………………………………………………………………………….. has been registered at ...................................................................................................................... in ……………………………. (home country or host country) for Fall / Spring Term. Arrival Date ......................... (dd/mm/yy) Institutional / Departmental Coordinator: Date Signature Stamp Please fill out the departure date part at the end of mobility. Departure Date ......................... (dd/mm/yy) Institutional / Departmental Coordinator: Date Signature Stamp FIRO-C42001-09
